field.label: Product URL Prefix
field.comment: Enter a prefix to prepend to product URLs. This text will be added between Base URL and product URL. Example: "product". Leave empty for no prefix.

field.label: Category URL Prefix
field.comment: Enter a prefix to prepend to category URLs. This text will be added between Base URL and category URL. Example: "collections". Leave empty for no prefix.

field.label: Exclude text from URL
field.comment: Configuration to exclude certain texts from url, separate multiple texts by each line
